description:
This is the final of the three-part course focusing on building a global brand and business. For the women entrepreneurs taking this course, you'll learn the nitty-gritty of the Global Trade process.

We'll show you, step-by-step, how to:

  • Use specific government websites to conduct thorough market research
  • Understand potential obstacles in a given country (political unrest, trade agreement modifications, currency fluctuations, and more)
  • Utilize a global network of US-based consultants to help vet potential business partners and develop meaningful relationships
  • Fill out Global Trade documentation (bill of lading, customs declarations, etc) to ensure compliance and decrease headaches

After you've completed all three courses, you will have the option to gain a digital badge to place on your social media profiles and let the world know you've done the work necessary to be a viable global businesswoman.
title: Girls Gone Global™ | Take Your Business MicroGlobal™ | 3/3
